name: Manuel M. Oliveira
content: Manuel Oliveira's web page Manuel Menezes de Oliveira Neto Professor of Computer Science Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul Instituto de Informática Caixa Postal 15.064 91501-970 Porto Alegre, RS Brazil Building 43413  Office  212    phone: +55 (51) 3308-6821    fax: +55 (51) 3308-7308 I am interested in all aspects of Computer Graphics, but especially in the frontiers between Graphics, Image Processing, and Vision (both human and machine). This includes Machine Learning for Graphics/Vision, Image and Video Filtering, Computational Photography, Deep Learning, Diffusion Models, Deconvolution, Real-Time and Photorealistic Rendering, Measurements and Corrections of Human Visual Aberrations, Image/Video Matting and Compositing, Sub-Space Detection, Image-based Modeling and Rendering, and 3D Photography. I am also very interested in medical and innovative uses of mobile technologies. If you are interested in graduate studies (MS or PhD) or in a post-doc position in these areas, please check my publications page and send me some e-mail. orcid.org/0000-0003-4957-9984 Short Biography    Publications Patents    Professional Activities Relief Texture Mapping    Teaching   Students Awards    Lattes Google Scholar DBLP ACM Digital Library     IEEE Xplore Digital Library Research Gate    Microsoft Academic Cursos Completos Disponíveis no YouTube (Full Courses Available on YouTube - in Portuguese) Processamento de Imagens (Image Processing) Computação Gráfica (Computer Graphics)
